input_email_body:
Subject: Repeated Network Outages Report

Dear Customer Support,

We are experiencing repeated network outages which might be due to faulty settings on our Cisco Router ISR4331 My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Please investigate and advise a solution at your earliest convenience. Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Best regards,

<name> You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.
